thread.title: Cisco posts loss on $11.1 billion tax-related charge

title: Cisco posts loss on $11.1 billion tax-related charge
text: February 14, 2018 / 9:19 PM / Updated 9 minutes ago Cisco posts loss on $11.1 billion tax-related charge Reuters Staff 1 Min Read (Reuters) - Network gear maker Cisco Systems Inc ( CSCO.O ) posted a net loss on Wednesday due to an $11.1 billion (7.93 billion pounds) charge related to recent changes to the U.S. tax law. The company posted a net loss of $8.8 billion, or $1.78 per share, in the second quarter ended Jan. 27, compared with a profit of $2.3 billion, or 47 cents per share, a year earlier. Quarterly revenue rose 2.6 percent to $8.7 billion, the first rise in more than two years. The company said its board approved a $25 billion increase to its stock repurchase plan. Reporting by Munsif Vengattil in Bengaluru; Editing by Sriraj Kalluvila
